excerpt: Typical regional grills & ceviche in a 19th-century house with a tree-shaded terrace.
detail_description: La Bodega de Santiago is a charming restaurant located in a 19th-century house with a lovely tree-shaded terrace. It offers typical regional grills and delicious ceviche, making it a perfect spot to enjoy authentic local cuisine. The restaurant has received positive feedback for its great food and friendly service, although some find it slightly expensive. Overall, it's known for serving excellent tapas in a delightful setting, making it a must-visit dining destination in Yaiza.
name: La Bodega de Santiago
address: C. Montañas del Fuego, 27, 35570 Yaiza, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the vibrant marina of Arrecife, Restaurante Lilium is a culinary gem run by a passionate husband-and-wife duo. This charming eatery has garnered attention for its exceptional quality and reasonable prices, earning it a Michelin Bib Gourmand commendation. The menu showcases an array of beautifully presented dishes crafted from locally sourced ingredients like succulent scallops, fresh tuna loin, and tender suckling pig.
name: Restaurante Lilium
address: Marina Lanzarote, Av. Olof Palme, S/N, Centro Comercial, 35500 Arrecife, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: La Casa de La Playa is a popular beachfront fish restaurant located in Costa Teguise, Arrieta. It's advisable to arrive early as it tends to get crowded, especially with locals. The menu offers delightful options such as Puntillas de Calamares and fresh seafood platters. Despite its unassuming exterior, the restaurant is always bustling with activity. The staff may have limited English skills, but this adds to the charm of the place.
name: La Casa de La Playa
address: C. el Lajero, 1C, 35542 Haría, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Unique volcanic tunnel & caverns featuring an underground concert hall, restaurant & salt lake.
detail_description: Jameos del Agua is a unique attraction located in Lanzarote, featuring volcanic tunnels and caverns that house an underground concert hall, restaurant, and salt lake. Designed by local artist Cesar Manrique, this masterpiece combines nature and art to create a feeling of harmony. Visitors can sample contemporary dishes at the restaurant while admiring the extraordinary natural setting inside a cave created by a volcanic eruption.
name: Jameos del Agua
address: LZ 204, Parcela 109, Carretera Arrieta - Órzola S/N Lanzarote, LZ-204, 109, 35542 Punta Mujeres, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the charming town of Tiagua, Restaurante El Tenique offers a delightful dining experience with both indoor and outdoor seating options. The sunny terrace is perfect for enjoying meals during warm weather. The menu showcases an array of local delicacies, including artisan cheeses, savory goat meat stew, refreshing ceviche, and expertly grilled seafood. Visitors often appreciate the friendly atmosphere that makes it a popular spot for locals celebrating special occasions.
name: Restaurante El Tenique
address: Av. Guanarteme, 100, 35558 Tiagua, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Steaks, lamb chops & fish grilled over coal & wood fires, served in a cozy, stone-lined dining room.
detail_description: La Cascada Restaurant, located in the heart of Puerto del Carmen's Old Town, offers a cozy and inviting dining experience. The restaurant shares a spacious area with its sister restaurant, Bodega, making it ideal for larger groups and special occasions. With a team trained in merchandise control and dedicated to innovation, La Cascada prides itself on offering traditional yet innovative dishes.
name: La Cascada Restaurant
address: C. Roque Nublo, 3, 5, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Puerto del Carmen, Taberna De Nino is a delightful Spanish eatery that captures the essence of local cuisine. This charming tavern is renowned for its mouthwatering tapas and traditional Canarian dishes, such as the beloved papas arrugadas con mojo and calamares a la plancha. The inviting atmosphere makes it perfect for sharing plates with friends or family while savoring vibrant flavors.
name: Taberna De Nino
address: C. Timanfaya, 2, Local 10 Centro Comercial, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante Naia Lanzarote, located in the heart of Arrecife, offers a delightful dining experience with its Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. The restaurant's interior, designed by the MT Architecture and Design Studio, is as captivating as its menu. The elegant presentation of dishes like micuit foie gras and Saharan squid on potato puree reflects the attention to detail at Naia.
name: Restaurante Naia Lanzarote
address: Av. César Manrique, 33, 35500 Arrecife, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Bright restaurant serving Mediterranean-inspired international dishes using regional ingredients.
detail_description: La Puerta Verde is a vibrant restaurant located in a serene part of town, offering a diverse menu of Mediterranean-inspired international dishes made with locally sourced ingredients. The restaurant provides both indoor and outdoor seating options, along with ample parking facilities. Guests can expect friendly and attentive staff to enhance their dining experience. With an array of menu choices and a selection of local wines, La Puerta Verde is a popular choice among visitors, often requiring advance booking due to its popularity.
name: La Puerta Verde
address: C. Fajardo, 24, 35520 Haría, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante El Navarro is a family-run restaurant that offers fine dining with a focus on European, Mediterranean, and Spanish cuisine. The warm goats cheese with beetroot and the spicy chocolate brownie are highly recommended dishes. It's popular among both locals and tourists, so it's advisable to make reservations well in advance. The restaurant provides a first-class dining experience and is known for its Mediterranean feast.
name: Restaurante El Navarro
address: Av. del Mar, 19, Local 13, 35508 Costa Teguise, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurant Casa Carlos is a popular dining spot located in Playa Blanca Lanzarote, offering a modern and bright interior with stunning ocean views. The menu features a variety of Mediterranean dishes including fish, meat, pizza, and pasta, as well as modern options like the highly recommended curry prawns paired with local white wine. The warm and welcoming atmosphere created by Carlos and his staff makes it an ideal choice for visitors.
name: Restaurant Casa Carlos
address: Puerto Marina Rubicon, C. el Berrugo, 2, Local 27A, 35580 Playa Blanca, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Creative use of seasonal Lanzarote ingredients in a chic, modern space run by a husband & wife team.
detail_description: Restaurante La Cocina de Colacho is a chic and modern dining spot located just outside Playa Blanca in the Marina Rubicon area. Run by a husband-and-wife team, this restaurant offers an open kitchen where diners can witness the culinary magic happening. The menu features expertly prepared dishes created by Lanzarote-born chef Nicolas Machin, also known as Colacho.
name: Restaurante La Cocina de Colacho
address: C. Velázquez, 15, 35580 Lanzarote, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante El Diablo is a unique dining experience located in the heart of Timanfaya Park, an area formed by volcanic eruptions. Designed by renowned architect Cesar Manrique, the restaurant offers a 360-degree panoramic view of the surrounding volcanoes and rock formations. What sets this eatery apart is its method of cooking - using the natural heat rising from the volcano to grill meat and fish dishes. Guests can even witness their meals being cooked in this extraordinary manner.
name: Restaurante El Diablo
address: Montaña del Fuego, Carretera general Yaiza-Tinajo s/n, 35570, Diseminado Islote Hilario, 1, 35560 Tinajo, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Beers & tapas, plus robust, meaty mains & ice cream, at a colorful airy bar with a terrace.
detail_description: La Carmencita del Puerto is a vibrant and colorful bar with a terrace, offering an array of tapas, hearty main dishes, and delightful ice cream. It's highly recommended among the top tapas restaurants in Lanzarote for its authentic and unique tapas. The restaurant is known for its friendly staff serving amazing Spanish tapas and great wine. While it may not be located directly on the boulevard, it's definitely worth seeking out for a memorable dining experience.
name: La Carmencita del Puerto
address: C. Chabusquillo, 47, Centro Comercial Matagorda, 35510 Matagorda, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Centro Cultural La Tegala is a charming spot nestled in Haria, Lanzarote, where the essence of traditional Canarian cuisine meets a delightful Spanish flair. This inviting restaurant offers an array of local dishes that are sure to tantalize your taste buds, with highlights including succulent goat stew and perfectly broiled octopus paired with zesty mojo sauce. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, making it a popular gathering place for locals and visitors alike.
name: Centro Cultural La Tegala
address: Pl. León y Castillo, 16, 35520 Haría, Las Palmas, Spain

name: Cafetería Simple & Natural
address: Centro Comercial El Pueblo, local 11, 35580 Playa Blanca, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled just northwest of Playa de la Caleta, El Fondeadero is a charming local Spanish restaurant that embodies the essence of laid-back dining. This no-frills eatery offers a delightful escape for those seeking an authentic experience away from the bustling tourist spots. With its focus on fresh seafood and generous portions, diners can enjoy great value without compromising on quality. The atmosphere is relaxed and welcoming, making it an ideal spot for lunch with locals who appreciate good food at reasonable prices.
name: El Fondeadero
address: Av. los Corales, 22, 35508 Las Caletas, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Cofradía de Pescadores Restaurante is a highly recommended restaurant in Playa Blanca, specializing in fresh fish dishes. Visitors rave about the mussels, garlic prawns, paella, and mixed fish grill. The seafood is described as incredibly fresh and delicious. Guests also praise the friendly and welcoming staff, with special mention of Luis for his exceptional service with children.
name: Cofradía de Pescadores Restaurante
address: C. del Chinchorro, s/n, 35580 Playa Blanca, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante Bogavante is one of the top Spanish restaurants in El Golfo, located on Avenida Maritima. It's known for its delicious seafood dishes and Mediterranean cuisine. The restaurant offers a great dining experience with a variety of options to choose from. Visitors can enjoy the beautiful coastal views while savoring their meals. Restaurante Bogavante is highly recommended for those looking to indulge in authentic Spanish flavors and fresh seafood in a charming setting by the sea.
name: Restaurante Bogavante
address: Av. Marítima, 39, 35570 El Golfo, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Casa Rafa Restaurante De Mar is a popular dining spot in Yaiza, Lanzarote, offering a variety of delicious international dishes. The restaurant is known for its seafood and Mediterranean cuisine, making it a must-visit for food enthusiasts. With themed nights and a buffet-style service for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, Casa Rafa provides an enjoyable dining experience for locals and tourists alike.
name: Casa Rafa Restaurante De Mar
address: Av. Marítima, 10, 35570 El Golfo, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: La Cabana Macher is a top-notch, luxury restaurant with innovative Mediterranean-fusion cuisine. The dishes are well-balanced and creative, and the service is excellent. The only downside is that some of the combinations lack creativity and balance of flavors.
name: La Cabaña Macher Restaurante
address: Carretera Tías, 84, 35571 Macher, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Mirador de las Salinas is a must-visit spot in Yaiza, Spain. It offers incredible views and reasonable prices, making it an excellent choice for enjoying a good plate of rice. The area also boasts nearby attractions such as the delightful village El Golfo with superb restaurants, Las Salinas, and the famous wine bodegas and stunning landscape of La Geria valley.
name: Mirador de las Salinas
address: C. los Molinos, 6, 35570 La Hoya, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Jameos del Agua Restaurante is a unique dining experience located in Lanzarote. Set within a stunning cave, the restaurant offers an unforgettable atmosphere designed by Cesar Manrique. The food is delicious and the service is smooth, making for an enjoyable evening. Visitors can also enjoy a free concert after dinner. Despite being a tourist hotspot, the restaurant manages to create a peaceful and beautiful ambiance with soft music and lovely views.
name: Jameos del Agua Restaurante
address: Calle de Jameos del Agua, s/n, 35542 Punta Mujeres, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Amura Restaurante is a popular dining spot in Puerto Calero, Lanzarote, known for its great location and beautiful views. The restaurant offers friendly staff, takeaway options, and an extensive wine list. With a focus on Indian cuisine, it serves a variety of dishes and drinks including desserts like flija.
name: Amura
address: Paseo Maritimo, 35571 Puerto Calero, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Coentro is a restaurant located in Puerto Calero, Lanzarote, offering a diverse menu with influences from Asian fusion and healthy cuisine. The chef, Joao Faraco, brings his Brazilian heritage to the forefront with native dishes alongside Iberian favorites. The restaurant is known for its fresh ingredients and excellent sauces, making it an ideal choice for seafood enthusiasts. Additionally, Coentro offers an adventurous tasting menu that provides a comprehensive experience of the chef's culinary vision.
name: coentro
address: Plaza del Arte, Local 11, 35571 Puerto Calero, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Rustic winery, tapas restaurant & guesthouse set amid the lava rock landscape of La Geria park.
detail_description: El Chupadero Lanzarote is a charming establishment located in the unique landscape of La Geria park in Lanzarote. It offers a combination of a rustic winery, tapas restaurant, and guesthouse amidst the striking lava rock surroundings. The village of La Geria provides an incredible backdrop with its green vines and palms set against the black volcanic ash, creating a dramatic contrast.
name: El Chupadero Lanzarote
address: La Geria, 3, 35570, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Cantina Teguise is a tapas restaurant in a 500 year old building on the island of Tenerife. The restaurant has been reimagined by British owners as an international gastronomic destination with stunningly atmospheric decor and excellent food. Food is beautifully presented and delicious, and they have a dairy free option available when requested. The staff are friendly and helpful, and the atmosphere is warm and inviting.
name: Cantina Teguise
address: C. León y Castillo, 8, 35530 Teguise, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: The Mercado Municipal de Abastos de Haría is a charming local market located next to the village church, open every weekend from 10:00 to 14:00. It offers a variety of locally produced goods including fruits, vegetables, jams, wine, cheese, and artisan crafts. The indoor market also houses a popular restaurant serving authentic Lanzarote dishes such as garlic soup with ham and goat stew.
name: Mercado Municipal de Abastos de Haría
address: C. Barranco de Tesnesia, 2A, 35520 Haría, Las Palmas, Spain

name: Restaurante El Barquillo (El Sótano)
address: C. Recalmon, 20, 35560 La Santa, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Laid-back restaurant offering grilled meats along with diverse globally inspired dishes.
detail_description: La Bohemia in Costa Teguise is a popular restaurant known for its laid-back atmosphere and diverse menu. It's a great spot for meat lovers, offering a variety of grilled meats with an Uruguayan touch. The house specialty is the Argentinian barbecue, and they also serve delicious starters like gazpacho and garlic prawns. Due to its popularity, it's recommended to make reservations in advance.
name: La Bohemia
address: Lanzarote, Av. de las Islas Canarias, 11, Local 6, 35508 Costa Teguise, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurant Costa Azul, located at No 8 Avenida Maritima, offers the best of Lanzarote's coast. With a quaint covered terrace right by the sea, it provides an incredible dining experience with incredibly fresh seafood and daily specials that capture the essence of the sea.
name: Restaurant Costa Azul
address: Av. Marítima, 8, 35570 El Golfo, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: La Chalanita is a well-established Mediterranean restaurant located by Playa Blanca beach, offering stunning ocean views and a memorable dining experience, especially during sunset. The restaurant's classic menu caters to seafood lovers and vegetarians alike, earning it a strong reputation over the years. Visitors can enjoy watching the chefs prepare paellas in front of them, adding an entertaining element to their meal.
name: La Chalanita
address: Av. Marítima, 73, 35580 Playa Blanca, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Laid-back restaurant with sea views crafting refined seafood, salads, steaks & cocktails.
detail_description: Restaurante Villa Toledo is a laid-back dining spot in Costa Teguise, housed in the oldest building and offering stunning sea views next to Playa Bastian beach. The restaurant's spacious outdoor terrace, complete with a small pool and fountain, attracts many diners seeking a relaxing atmosphere. Their extensive menu features traditional Canarian dishes alongside international specialties.
name: Restaurante Villa Toledo
address: Av. los Cocederos, s/n, 35508 Costa Teguise, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Elevated seafood dishes in a relaxed venue with a panoramic terrace overlooking the marina.
detail_description: Nestled on a picturesque hilltop, Mardeleva is a charming family-run restaurant that offers an unforgettable dining experience with breathtaking views of the marina. This hidden gem specializes in fresh seafood, showcasing the catch of the day—be sure to try their delectable barracuda, whether fried or grilled, paired perfectly with traditional papas arrugadas.
name: Mardeleva
address: C. los Infantes, 10, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Outdoor restaurant serving seafood plates on a simple terrace overlooking the ocean.
detail_description: Bar Cafeteria El Pisquito is a small but highly recommended outdoor restaurant located in Arrieta, offering seafood tapas, octopus, limpets, and fresh fish. Despite its size, the staff's dedication ensures a great dining experience. The simple terrace overlooks the ocean and provides a perfect setting to enjoy their delicious grilled squid and sardines at reasonable prices.
name: Bar Cafeteria El Pisquito
address: C. la Noria, 6, 35542 Arrieta, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Be Papagayo - Chiringuito is a renowned beach restaurant situated on the stunning Papagayo Beach in Lanzarote. It offers a perfect setting to enjoy high-quality tapas made from local ingredients, along with refreshing cocktails and ambient music. The restaurant is known for its well-presented and served food, specializing in rice dishes such as the exquisite black ink paella.
name: Be Papagayo - Chiringuito
address: Parque natural los Ajaches, 35580 Playa papagayo, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante Casa Torano is a popular dining spot in El Golfo, Lanzarote, known for its seafood delights and stunning sunset views. With 935 unbiased reviews on Tripadvisor, it's ranked among the top restaurants in the area. The restaurant offers a small but perfectly formed cocktail menu, making it an ideal place to enjoy the beautiful sunsets of Lanzarote.
name: Restaurante Casa Torano
address: Av. Marítima, 24B, 35570 El Golfo, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Sushi Bar Minato is a restaurant located in Puerto Calero, Lanzarote, offering a delightful experience for those craving sushi or Japanese cuisine. Situated on the marina strip with stunning sea views, it provides a menu featuring fresh local sushi, sashimi, tempura, various sushi rolls (both vegetarian and fish options), miso soup, and an array of noodle dishes.
name: Sushi Bar Minato
address: Edificio Antiguo Varadero, local 9 B – 1ª Planta, 35570 Puerto Calero, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Indian Delights is a charming restaurant located in the heart of Playa Blanca town, offering a warm welcome and impeccable standards. The husband and wife team, Ramesh and Saraswati, ensure that guests have a delightful experience. The restaurant overlooks the ocean, providing a beautiful view while enjoying delicious Indian cuisine made with fresh ingredients. The environment is described as quiet, clean, and cozy with doors open to the balcony for an oceanic breeze.
name: Indian Delights
address: Av. de Papagayo, 15, 35580 Playa Blanca, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Easygoing restaurant providing traditional housemade pizzas & Italian entrees, plus outdoor tables.
detail_description: Avenida 55 is a laid-back restaurant in Playa Blanca, known for its authentic Italian cuisine and welcoming atmosphere. Visitors have praised the traditional housemade pizzas, flavorful Italian entrees, and outdoor seating options. Guests have enjoyed dishes like seafood spaghetti for its delicious flavors and generous portions at reasonable prices. The friendly service has also been highlighted, with attentive staff adding to the overall positive dining experience.
name: Avenida 55
address: Av. de Papagayo, 55, 35580 Playa Blanca, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Teguise, the original capital of Lanzarote, La Cantina is a charming eatery that exudes rustic warmth and character. Housed in a historic 17th-century building, this delightful spot is not just about food; it also features the Secret Cinema, where you can catch classic and independent films in an intimate setting. The menu focuses on local produce and wines from Lanzarote, offering delectable sharing boards filled with island specialties.
name: LA CANTINA
address: CALLE OLOF PALME S/N PLANTA ALTA MERCADO, Av. la Marina, 35500 Arrecife, Las Palmas, Spain

name: Restaurante LagOmar
address: C. los Loros, 6, 35539 Nazaret, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Blooming Cactus is a charming veggie restaurant located at the far end of Calle Teide at 35. The restaurant offers a small but delightful selection of vegan and vegetarian dishes, with options for those who are wheat-free or lactose intolerant. The cozy tavern-style decor and friendly staff create a welcoming atmosphere, making guests feel right at home. Visitors rave about the delicious food, including popular dishes like curry and moussaka.
name: Blooming Cactus
address: C. Teide, 35, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Tacande, located in Plaza de Haria, is a contemporary fusion eatery renowned for its unique blend of Asian and Moroccan cuisines. The restaurant incorporates locally sourced ingredients into their menu and boasts an enticing combination of indoor and outdoor seating options. Tacande offers a delightful gastronomic experience by skillfully melding diverse textures and flavors to present top-notch dishes featuring high-quality meat, vegetables, and fish.
name: Restaurante Tacande
address: Plaza del Castillo, 5, 35520 Haría, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Grill - Asador Volcan de La Corona is a renowned restaurant in Lanzarote, located in the village of Ye. It's known for its exceptional grilled meats and delightful signature dishes that offer a burst of flavors. The restaurant provides a wonderful dining experience with attentive and precise service. The menu includes delicious tapas like salad with onion and sauces, fried mushrooms with palm honey, and goat cheese.
name: Grill-Asador Volcan de La Corona
address: C. San Francisco Javier, 28, 35541 Ye, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante El Lago is a charming eatery located in the coastal villages of Arrieta and Punta Mujeres. Run by Angel, this restaurant offers an array of delectable dishes including fresh fish, paella, and traditional Spanish cuisine. The terrace provides a picturesque view of the sea, creating a delightful dining experience. With a relaxed ambiance and friendly service, El Lago boasts an extensive menu featuring reasonably priced local fish options.
name: Restaurante El Lago
address: C. Caleta de Campo, 15, 35542 Arrieta, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the charming village of Arrieta, Restaurante Amanecer offers a delightful culinary escape for those exploring Lanzarote. This gem is renowned for its fresh seafood, including a mouthwatering parrillada de pescado that showcases the island's rich maritime bounty. Diners rave about the exquisite zamburinas and the famous vieja fish, perfect for sharing among friends or loved ones.
name: Restaurante Amanecer
address: C. la Garita, 46, 35542 Arrieta, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled beneath the majestic cliffs and overlooking the breathtaking Playa de Famara, Restaurante Dunas de Famara offers a delightful culinary experience that beautifully marries local flavors with global influences. Drawing inspiration from the diverse cuisines of Galicia, East Asia, and Peru, this modern eatery showcases fresh seafood as its star ingredient. The menu features enticing dishes like bao buns filled with black pig bacon and hoisin sauce, highlighting the restaurant's commitment to using high-quality local produce while exploring international tastes.
name: Restaurante Dunas de Famara
address: C. Chirimoya, 13, 35558 Urb. Famara, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante El Risco in Caleta de Famara is dedicated to ensuring customer satisfaction. The management and chefs bring years of experience in the gastronomic sector, offering a selection of dishes made with top-quality products and raw materials. This commitment sets them apart from other good restaurants. Founded by Pedro and Marco, this culinary paradise stands out as a 5-star, Michelin-listed restaurant in Lanzarote, bringing elegance and authenticity to every dish.
name: Restaurante El Risco
address: C. Chirimoya, 15, 35558 Urb. Famara, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Kamezí Deli & Bistró in Playa Blanca, Lanzarote is a must-visit for those seeking a top-notch gastronomic experience. The restaurant offers sophisticated dining and prides itself on creating the best delicacies of Lanzarote using ingredients sourced within 100km of the restaurant. Chef Abel del Rosario's creative cuisine has earned recognition in the Michelin Guide and a Repsol Sun. The restaurant also boasts its own artisan bread bakery.
name: Kamezí Restaurant
address: · Yaiza · Lanzarote, C. Monaco, 2, 35580 Playa Blanca, Las Palmas, Spain
